articles.title: Ramadan 2024 LIVE moon sighting: Saudi Arabia calls Muslims to spot the crescent - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ramadan 2024 moon sighting LIVE: Did Muslims in Saudi Arabia, UAE, Australia, UK, US etc sight Ramadan crescent moon or Ramzan Chand? Catch latest news here
articles.content: The moon sighting before Ramadan, also known as Ramzan/Ramazan/Ramzaan, is a practice that is a traditional and essential aspect of the Islamic faith as it determines the commencement of the month of… [+5825 chars]
